original_text: I will bring you gold instead of bronze. I will bring you silver instead of iron. I will give you bronze to use, instead of wood. I will give you iron instead of stones. I will cause peace to be your city's leader. Righteousness will rule over you. I will bring you gold instead of bronze.
korean_text: 내가 금을 가지고 놋을 대신하며 은을 가지고 철을 대신하며 놋으로 나무를 대신하며 철로 돌을 대신하며 화평을 세워 관원으로 삼으며 공의를 세워 감독으로 삼으리니

sentences.original_text: I will bring you gold instead of bronze.
I will bring you silver instead of iron.
I will give you bronze to use, instead of wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나무 대신 사용할 청동을 주리라.

sentences.original_text: I will give you iron instead of stones.
I will cause peace to be your city's leader.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 평화로 네 도시의 지도자가 되게 하리라.

sentences.original_text: I will bring you gold instead of bronze.
